name: df-gz
body: |- wceq(cgz, crab(s0, cc, wa(wcel(cfv(cre, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(cfv(cim, cv(s0)), cz))))
comment: Define the set of gaussian integers, which are complex numbers whose real and imaginary parts are integers. (Note that the ` [ _i ] ` is actually part of the symbol token and has no independent meaning.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2014.)
